name: Anomalytics: From the Files of the Arcane Statistics Authority
name_original: Anomalytics: From the Files of the Arcane Statistics Authority
description:
As a newly-minted field agent of the Arcane Statistics Authority, delve into the concrete depths of abandoned logistics facilities, malicious start-ups, and redacted art exhibitions to log arcane phenomena. Armed with your trusty calculator and a trove of officially-sanctioned empirical equipment, prepare to combat the unknown ... by measuring it.

Measure, tally, scan, transcribe, and wrangle your way through 15+ missions in career mode, or test your grit through an endless gauntlet of arcane assignments in overtime mode. Just beware - danger lurks around every corner, and your benefits don't include insurance. Will you rise through the ranks by mastering your numbers, or will you end up as ... just another statistic?

Features

  • Experience white-hot encoding excitement across story and roguelike modes
  • Try not to get fired amidst ever-escalating jobs and quality standards
  • Learn valuable time management and prioritization skills
  • Explore liminal spaces
  • Confront (run away from) mysterious entities
  • Enjoy the cubic confines of your own virtual office!

... and more, in the perilous and inscrutable future!
